one_reviews_text: This was a pretty fascinating experience, different from anything else I've tried. Animation is amateur and there are ridiculous bright white loading screens every 30 seconds, but the imagery is still powerful and moving. The story is really not inspirational or feel good, like touched by an Angel, but instead it leaves you with a real sense of desperation. I recommend checking it out and I wonder if the developer would consider releasing a playlist/ album of the music, which was really excellent.

Felt like a meditation on a mother's love for her son, birth, life, death and the afterlife. Some scenes were eerie, others calming and yet others disturbing - as all the scenes wove together, the experience accumulated impact and power. Overall, I thought this piece was beautifully done.
it makes me  sad,,, and there are to many episodes and these are to short,,, the image quality is not very good looking as well

With a fantastic soundtrack, beautiful imagery, and a moving story that strives to shed light on today's social issues, I cannot recommend this experience enough!
Experience this when you are ready for something more than shooters in VR.
